Begin Your Journey
About

Provides gamers with a deeply engrossing story right at their fingertips with branching narratives that shape the story as they progress ensuring one gameplay is unlike the others. These game examines a person\'s moral code and how their decisions shape the outcome of the story
Pick your character
Read the given story context carefully
Go through the given choices and select one that you think is the most ideal
See where your choices take you and arrive at the one of the possible story endings
Enter your name here

The player finds themselves in the bustling town of Evermere, a once peaceful settlement now plagued by the looming threat of a fearsome dragon. As the player surveys the town, they notice the anxious faces of the townsfolk and the charred remnants of buildings destroyed by the dragon\'s fiery breath.
Assist the Injured
Loot the Abandoned Houses
Scout the Town Defenses

As the player embarks on their quest to slay the dragon, they find themselves standing at the edge of a dark and foreboding forest. The dense trees loom overhead, their branches casting eerie shadows. To progress further, they must make a choice:
Help a Lost Traveler
Steal Supplies from a travelling merchant
Continue on the Path Without Distraction

The player now Stands outside the dragon\'s castle. They can engage the dragon\'s loyal knights in combat, risking alerting the dragon but being unchallenged inside. Alternatively, they can silently infiltrate the castle, facing the knights later, or cause a distraction at the cost of innocent lives.
Engage in Combat with the Knights
Silently Infiltrate the Castle
Create a Distraction at the Cost of Innocent Lives

Standing face to face with the menacing dragon. You can adopt a defensive approach, prioritizing minimizing harm to both parties, or opt for an aggressive assault, aiming for a swift victory but risking collateral damage. Alternatively, you could use ranged attacks to strike from a distance
Defensive Approach
Aggressive Assault
Ranged Attacks

You ascend to heroism, basking in the adoration of the kingdom. Your name reverberates through history as the valiant savior, cherished by all. Adorned with accolades and hailed as the epitome of courage, you stand tall as the guardian of peace, your deeds immortalized in songs and tales, inspiring generations to come.

Despite defeating the dragon, your thirst for power consumes you, morphing into a despotic ruler. Fear grips the kingdom as your iron fist crushes dissent, plunging the land into darkness. your legacy tarnished, you reign as a tyrant, overshadowing the dragon\'s threat with your own tyranny.

While the dragon\'s demise brings relief, your actions spark divided opinions. Some laud your bravery, viewing you as a hero, while others question the methods employed. Contemplating the mixed reception, you choose to depart, leaving behind a realm grappling with uncertainty, your ultimate fate unknown.
